# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our flagship product. This item holds immense value to us, and we believe it would be equally valuable to you. We are offering you the chance to purchase this product at a special introductory price of $1,350,000. This offer is designed to ensure that both parties benefit from this transaction while recognizing the significant worth of the product to you. We trust that you will find this proposal favorable and look forward to your positive response. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. Sincerely, [Your Name] 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $1,350,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $1,350,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $1,200,000
